content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production at (-15, -50)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-15, -50) mining iron ore
- Stone furnace at (-14, -48) smelting iron plates
Currently working but output is blocked

### Additional Iron Smelters
Two stone furnaces at:
- Position (0, 0)
- Position (2, 0)
Both currently idle with no ingredients

### Copper Plate Production at (4, 4)
Two stone furnaces at:
- Position (4, 4) with 30 copper plates in output
- Position (6, 4) with 6 copper plates in output
Both currently idle with no ingredients

### Power Generation System
Connected system consisting of:
- Offshore pump at (-9.5, 24.5) extracting water
- Boiler at (-2, 23.5)
- Steam engine at (9.5, 19.5)
- Connected by pipe networks:
  - Water pipes from pump to boiler
  - Steam pipes from boiler to engine
- Electric poles connecting power to lab

### Research Facility
- Lab at (0.5, 8.5)
- Connected to power network
- Currently researching Automation technology
- Contains 7 automation science packs

# ERROR TIPS

### Inventory Management Errors
- Check inventory for required items before attempting to place or craft items
- Ensure you have necessary raw materials before starting crafting chains

### Entity Placement Errors
- Verify you have the required entity in inventory before attempting placement
- When placing connected systems (like power/fluid), ensure you have all components ready

### Resource Input Errors
- Check fuel levels in machines regularly
- Ensure continuous supply of raw materials to keep production flowing
- Clear output blockages to maintain production

### API Usage Errors
- Cannot directly access prototype dimensions with + operator
- Use proper methods to get entity dimensions

### Production Chain Planning
- Plan complete production chains including all intermediate products
- Ensure you have recipes and capabilities to produce all required items
- Some items (like wood) must be gathered rather than crafted

### Power System Setup
- Ensure all components of power system are properly connected
- Set up fuel supply for boilers before expecting power generation
- Connect power poles to both power generators and consumers
